entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Flurries beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
